purpose: Facilitates the coordination and orchestration of multiple AI agents to perform complex tasks autonomously.
principle: Builds on multi-agent system architecture to enable communication and task distribution among agents.
reusability: Designed for plug-and-play integration with existing AI models and frameworks, supports API-based orchestration.
limitations: Being in alpha stage, it may have stability issues and limited documentation.
name: superagentx
description: Lightweight Multi Agent AI Orchestrator Framework with AGI Capabilities.
highlight: Lightweight framework for orchestrating multiple AI agents with potential AGI capabilities.
